Body:
self.fragment_data_list = []
self.fragment_data_list.append(chr(0))
if len(chr(command)) == 1:
    self.fragment_data_list.append(chr(0) + chr(command))
else:
    return 'ERROR - Command Attempt Length'
for i in range(0, len(self.fragment_data_list), 1):
    self.fragment_data_list[i] = self.fragment_data_list[i].replace(escapebyte,
        escapebyte + escapebyte)
    self.fragment_data_list[i] = self.fragment_data_list[i].replace(startbyte,
        escapebyte + startbyte)
    self.fragment_data_list[i] = self.fragment_data_list[i].replace(stopbyte,
        escapebyte + stopbyte)
    self.fragment_data_list[i] = startbyte + self.fragment_data_list[i]
    self.fragment_data_list[i] = self.fragment_data_list[i] + stopbyte
    self.tx_packet_queue.put(self.fragment_data_list[i])
